display_long_description:
On the surface WaterCeiling seems like a serendipitous  benefactor to one of the world's only surviving cities after the zombie apocalypse, but they are infinitely more nefarious.

This game introduces that surviving city Janks Hollow with more games already in development in that same universe.

You sought employment and protection with this company. As a drone candidate you have to make your way through the training to receive your Pilot's license.

What's in the box:

* Dual or single-controller support
* Configurable Comfort settings
* Subtitles
* Hard-core drone flight
* Infinite Enemy Drone Mode
* 34 handcrafted missions
* Precision VR drone flight
* Drone can pick up objects with its grabber
* Timed Runs
* Strange puzzles
* Explosive hazards and physics-driven chaos
* Holiday and themed challenge levels
* Unlock new boards as you advance through the WaterCeiling program
* After the training level you can explore the level on foot and climb everything or annoy your trainer as you mess with his desk
